body_html: Performing a concat & then a split of the gradients will still slow down calculation, so I would not modify existing RNNCells with this behavior. LSTMCell provides the ability to initialize the shared matrix, not individual gate weights.
body_text: Performing a concat & then a split of the gradients will still slow down calculation, so I would not modify existing RNNCells with this behavior.  LSTMCell provides the ability to initialize the shared matrix, not individual gate weights.
body: Performing a concat & then a split of the gradients will still slow down calculation, so I would not modify existing RNNCells with this behavior.  LSTMCell provides the ability to initialize the shared matrix, not individual gate weights.
